sentence.Network_en: At the same time, we encouraged eligible large state - owned enterprises to get listed after the stockholding system was established.

sentence.Network_en: Pax World's largest stockholding is Gap Inc.

sentence.Network_en: So we centralize our study on interaction of executive incentive, stockholding and firm performance.
sentence.Network_cn: 因此我们集中研究了上市公司高管薪酬 、 高管持股与企业业绩之间的交互作用.
